settings_descriptions.limit:
Limit defines the max value of received messages at once. 
Some responses could include a dozens of it, 
we predict that it may be annoying. 
The algorithm chooses a random slice of all results, so you will not lose anything, so feel free to configure it. Current amount of messages is:
